code: import React,{Component}from'react';import'./UserActivityPost.css';import deleteImg from"./../../../../assets/delete-icon.svg";import editImg from"./../../../../assets/edit-icon.svg";import{deletePost}from'./../../../../actions/post';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export class UserActivityPost extends Component{updateInfo(){const{_id}=this.props.userInfo;const updatePosts=this.props.parentState;deletePost(_id,updatePosts);}render(){const{image_url,price,title,_id}=this.props.userInfo;const post_url='/post/'+_id;const editpost_url='/editpost/'+_id;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"post",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("a",{href:post_url,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"postPhoto",src:image_url,alt:"user"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"postDesc",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"title",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("small",{className:"price",children:price})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"userPostModify",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:editpost_url,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"img-decoration",src:editImg,alt:""})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>{this.updateInfo();},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"img-decoration",src:deleteImg,alt:""})})]})})]});}}export default UserActivityPost;
